name: RankChain
description: RankChain Trust the Chain, Not the Noise. Discover top-performing wallets. Rank the smartest traders. Earn rewards for being right. RankChain brings AI and community insight together to unlock on-chain alpha. View All Rankings Core Features ChainSmart Tracking System AI models analyze on-chain behaviors to tag high-performing, active wallets and monitor their movements in real time. KOL Auto-Mapping Automatically identifies influential KOL wallets by analyzing both their on-chain actions and social footprint. Decentralized Scoring Mechanism Users can stake $RCN to participate in wallet Address rating, helping determine each address's accuracy, profitability, and influence. Weekly Leaderboard and Rewards Each week, the top 10 users and those who have voted (based on rating accuracy and contribution) will be rewarded with tokens from the reward pool. Data Visualization Tools Dive into the rich dashboard that showcases the history of the smart wallet, AI-analyzed KOL portfolio behavior and real-time on-chain signals. Empower On-Chain Alpha AI + Community = Alpha Generation Combines machine precision with decentralized wisdom for reliable address scoring. Transparency First All scoring, voting, and leaderboard logic is on-chain and verifiable. Participate and Earn Stakers become active participants in the leaderboard and share in the platform revenue. Multi-Chain Integration Built on major chains such as Solana and BNB Chain to ensure data accessibility and seamless interaction. RankChain Value Proposition Tokenomics Token Name $RCN Total Supply 1,000,000,000 $RCN Token Allocation Fair Launch & Liquidity 70% Staking & Rewards 10% Ecosystem Fund 10% Marketing & Partnerships 5% Team & Advisors 5% Utility Staking for Scoring Participation Stake $RCN tokens to participate in the wallet scoring mechanism. Your staked tokens grant you voting rights to rate the performance of smart money addresses, contributing to the platform's accuracy. Governance Rights Hold $RCN tokens to participate in decentralized governance. Token holders can propose and vote on key platform changes, including new features, reward structures, and more. Access to Premium Data & Insights Unlock exclusive analytics tools and advanced wallet tracking features by using $RCN. Gain access to premium reports, predictive analytics, and deeper insights into smart money behavior. Tokenized Analytics Services $RCN can be used to purchase tokenized data and analytics reports. This offers researchers, analysts, and developers valuable insights into wallet activities and market trends. Fee Reduction for Premium Features Stake $RCN tokens to receive discounts on platform fees for advanced services such as extended data storage, premium staking rewards, and additional governance powers. Roadmap Phase 1 Foundation & Launch Develop and test RankChain's AI-driven wallet tracking system Deploy smart contracts for staking, scoring, and reward distribution Launch the $RCN token via fair launch Integrate Solana and BNB Chain for multi-chain wallet tracking Release MVP with basic AI wallet analysis and user staking functions Launch $RCN token and initiate platform's staking rewards system Phase 2 Feature Expansion Introduce the KOL Auto-Mapping System, linking wallet behavior to social activity Roll out full leaderboard with dynamic ranking and weekly reward distribution Launch scoring reputation system, rewarding accurate participants Begin Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) governance with proposals and voting Expand platform to support Ethereum and major Layer2 chains (e.g., Arbitrum, Optimism) Launch community incentive programs to boost engagement and participation Phase 3 Prediction Market & Developer Tools Launch on-chain prediction market for smart wallet performance and KOL forecasts Provide API for third-party DApps, allowing them to integrate RankChain data Introduce a tokenized analytics marketplace for purchasing wallet insights Expand anti-Sybil mechanisms, incorporating zk-proofs for voting integrity Partner with blockchain analytics platforms and DeFi applications to broaden data accessibility Phase 4 Full DAO Governance & Ecosystem Growth Transition RankChain to full DAO governance, empowering token holders to control key decisions Open-source scoring models and wallet analysis algorithms for community contributions Launch the RankChain Ecosystem Grant Program to support development on the platform Organize seasonal RankChain Alpha Hunt to crowdsource alpha signals for top wallets Strengthen partnerships with DeFi projects, data analysts, and other Web3 platforms to drive growth
